summary:
As of earlier this week, Google is now referring to the experience as “Gemini on Google TV.”

It looks increasingly likely that it will soon be Gemini on Nest speakers (and smart displays). While “Google Assistant” is familiar branding, it’s ultimately better for the company to unify under Gemini at this point. Advertisement - scroll for more content

At CES 2025 in January, Google said “Assistant” on Android/Google TV would be upgraded with Gemini models.
